com.bandyer.android_sdk

Class BandyerSDK.Builder

  • com.bandyer.android_sdk.BandyerSDK.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BandyerSDK

    public static class BandyerSDK.Builder

    Builder class for BandyerSDK

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(android.app.Application applicationContext, java.lang.String appId) 
      Builder(android.app.Application applicationContext, java.lang.String appId, java.lang.String apiKey)
      Deprecated.  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BandyerSDK.Builder allowSDKInitFromActivity()
      Enables initialization of SDK from activity Be aware that the SDK may misbehave if initialized in an Activity! We strongly suggest to initialize it in the Application if possible.
      com.bandyer.android_sdk.BandyerSDKInterface build()
      Builds and returns the generated BandyerSdk instance
      BandyerSDK.Builder setEnvironment(Environment value)
      Method to set the environment for all modules
      BandyerSDK.Builder setGson(com.google.gson.Gson value)
      For advanced users only!! Method to use your implementation of gson. be sure to apply the gsonBuilder provided by the sdk, otherwise a new gson instance will be created and used!!
      BandyerSDK.Builder setGsonBuilder(com.google.gson.GsonBuilder value)
      Method to personalize the gson builder
      BandyerSDK.Builder setHttpStack(okhttp3.OkHttpClient value)
      For advanced users only!! Method to personalize the http stack be sure to apply the httpStackBuilder provided by the sdk, otherwise a new httpStack instance will be created and used!!
      BandyerSDK.Builder setHttpStackBuilder(okhttp3.OkHttpClient.Builder value)
      Method to personalize the http stack
      BandyerSDK.Builder setLogger(BandyerSDKLogger value)
      Method to personalize the base sdk logger
      BandyerSDK.Builder withCallEnabled(CallNotificationListener listener)
      Enable initialization of call capabilities Set also a call notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle an incoming call
      BandyerSDK.Builder withCallEnabled()
      Enable initialization of call capabilities Set also a call notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle an incoming call
      BandyerSDK.Builder withChatEnabled(ChatNotificationListener listener)
      Enables initialization of chat module Set also a chat notification listener, use this observer to handle how to handle an incoming chat message
      BandyerSDK.Builder withChatEnabled()
      Enables initialization of chat module Set also a chat notification listener, use this observer to handle how to handle an incoming chat message
      BandyerSDK.Builder withFileSharingEnabled(FileSharingNotificationListener listener)
      Enable initialization of file sharing capabilities Set also a file sharing notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle a notification for upload and or download
      BandyerSDK.Builder withFileSharingEnabled()
      Enable initialization of file sharing capabilities Set also a file sharing notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle a notification for upload and or download
      BandyerSDK.Builder withScreenSharingEnabled(ScreenSharingNotificationListener listener)
      Enable initialization of screen sharing capabilities Set also a screen sharing notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle a notification for ongoing screen recording
      BandyerSDK.Builder withScreenSharingEnabled()
      Enable initialization of screen sharing capabilities Set also a screen sharing notification listener, use this listener to handle how to handle a notification for ongoing screen recording
      BandyerSDK.Builder withUserDetailsFormatter(UserDetailsFormatter formatter) 
      BandyerSDK.Builder withUserDetailsProvider(UserDetailsProvider provider)
      Used to fetch users contact information based on user aliases.
      BandyerSDK.Builder withWhiteboardEnabled(WhiteboardNotificationListener listener)
      Enables initialization of whiteboard module Set also a whiteboard notification listener, use this observer to handle how to handle an whiteboard events
      BandyerSDK.Builder withWhiteboardEnabled()
      Enables initialization of whiteboard module Set also a whiteboard notification listener, use this observer to handle how to handle an whiteboard events

      • setHttpStack

        public BandyerSDK.Builder setHttpStack(okhttp3.OkHttpClient value)

        For advanced users only!! Method to personalize the http stack be sure to apply the httpStackBuilder provided by the sdk, otherwise a new httpStack instance will be created and used!!

        Parameters:
        value - okHttpClient to use
        Returns:

      • allowSDKInitFromActivity

        public BandyerSDK.Builder allowSDKInitFromActivity()

        Enables initialization of SDK from activity Be aware that the SDK may misbehave if initialized in an Activity! We strongly suggest to initialize it in the Application if possible.
